nio/RESTPolling.Description: Used as a base class for any block that needs to do polling of a URL. *Not a stand alone block.*

retry_limit.description: When a url request fails, number of times to attempt a retry before giving up.

retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

polling_interval.description: How often url is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the `polling_interval` times the number of queries.

nio/RESTPolling.Output: Varies depending on implementation of the base class. `_process_response(self, resp)` is to be implemented to return the signals that will be notified.
